attributes.action: To Put Greece and the Greek Islands into the Green List
attributes.additional_details: Greece and the Greek islands need us tourists as they could suffer financially if there is another summer without us tourists spending our money and people could lose their businesses especially on these very small Greek Islands.  Hurry up and put Greece and the islands on the Green List so us tourists can go on our holidays there and support them with paying to stay in their hotels, buy food and drinks from their bars/resturants, shop there and visit their attractions.
attributes.background: Please can you put Greece and the Greek Islands into the Green List for travel as the Greek Islands need to get all tourists back fast so they can survive as another summer without us tourists will affect them financially especially people's businesses

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585285
